additional_activities.label: Q10.  If applicable, please describe any events or activities that may have contributed to the plume observed on the date provided in Section 2.

additional_inspection_notes.label: Q9.  If applicable, provide any additional notes on the inspection or analysis of the area in question.

emission_identified_flag_fk.label: Q6.  Was a leak identified through prior knowledge or by follow-up monitoring after receipt of a CARB plume notice?

initial_leak_concentration.label: Q11:  Maximum concentration of methane leak (in ppmv).

inspection_timestamp.label: Q7.  If applicable, what was the date of owner/operator's ground monitoring of the area in question.

instrument.label: Q8.  If applicable, what was the instrument used to locate the leak (e.g., Fisher Scientific TVA2020; RKI Multigas Analyzer Eagle 2; TDL).

lat_revised.label: Q12.  Please provide a revised latitude if the leak location differs from CARB's estimate in Section 2.

leak_cause.label: Q15.  Please provide any additional information about the leak here or any events or activities that may have contributed observed plume.

leak_description.label: Q14:  Please select from the drop-down menu which option best matches the description of the leak.

long_revised.label: Q13.  Please provide a revised longitude if the leak location differs from CARB's estimate in Section 2.

mitigation_actions.label: Q16.  Describe any corrective actions taken.

re_monitored_concentration.label: Q19.  Re-monitored methane concentration after repair (ppmv).
